imdb.plot outline: London A To Z is an entertaining and informative live action/animation series providing a glimpse into the hidden gems of London that few people outside of the city know. Originally broad-cast on Finland's YLE, London A To Z won the Jury Grand Prix Award at the 2011 Shanghai Television Festival.
imdb.title: London A to Z
plot: London A To Z is an entertaining and informative live action/animation series providing a glimpse into the hidden gems of London that few people outside of the city know. Originally broad-cast on Finland's YLE, London A To Z won the Jury Grand Prix Award at the 2011 Shanghai Television Festival.::Stephanie Gatica
